tool_description: Filters accommodation results based on price range criteria, supporting different currencies and pricing periods.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to filter

currency.description: Currency code for price comparison (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

price_type.description: Whether prices are per_night or total_stay

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: property_ids and property_prices arrays must have the same length.
Invalid price range: min_price must be less than max_price, both must be non-negative.
Invalid currency: Use a valid 3-letter currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.).
Invalid price type: Use either 'per_night' or 'total_stay'.
Empty input arrays: Provide at least one property to filter.
usage: Provide property_ids and corresponding property_prices arrays, set min_price and/or max_price to filter results. Optionally specify currency and price_type.

filtered_property_ids.description: Property IDs that meet the price criteria

filtered_prices.description: Prices for properties that meet the criteria

excluded_count.description: Number of properties excluded by price filter

price_range_summary.description: Summary of the applied price filter range
